scripts.version: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.docker: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t trinitymirror/aws-ecs-autoscaler:$(npm run version | tail -1) .
scripts.docker:push: docker push trinitymirror/aws-ecs-autoscaler:$(npm run version | tail -1)
scripts.test: npm run lint && istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/index.js
